Name: General tolerances
Text:
-General tolerances according to ISO 2768-mK
unless otherwise specified.
-Surface roughness according to ISO 1302
unless otherwise specified: 3.2

Name: Sharp edges
Text: -Sharp edges to be removed and burrs according to ISO 13715.

Name: Welding
Text:
-Welds according to ISO 2553. All welds
continuous unless otherwise specified.
-Welding process: 141 (GTAW/TIG) according
to ISO 4063.
-Remove welding spatter. Welds shall be free
from cracks and porosity.

Name: Sheetmetal bending
Text:
-Bending radius according to material specifications.
Minimum inside bend radius: ≥ 1 × t (ISO 7438 reference).
-Do not crack, tear or excessively thin the material at bends.
-Maintain material temper condition. Do not anneal unless
otherwise specified.

Name: Tube bending
Text:
-Bending radius according to material specifications.
 Minimum inside bend radius: ≥ 1 × t (ISO 7438 reference).
-Do not crack, tear or excessively thin the material at bends.
-Maintain material temper condition. Do not anneal unless
otherwise specified.

Name: Welded assembly
Text: -Check alignment of welded parts within ±0.5 mm.

Name: Inspection of dimensions
Text:
-Dimensions in mm.
-All dimensions apply after welding and machining.

Name: Inspection welding
Text:
-General welding tolerances according to ISO 13920, class B.
-Visual inspection of welds according to ISO 17637.
